DOC.brief_summary: This 6 month study assess investigational medication patient dialysis secondary hyperparathyroidism . The study look effect parathyroid hormone , calcium phosphorus level .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Investigational Medication Treatment Secondary Hyperparathyroidism Patients Dialysis
DOC.criteria: Patients must receive hemodialysis ; elevate parathyroid hormone level ; pregnant nursing ; heart attack last 3 month .
